con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions name="PIPService" targetNamespace="urn:hieos:policy:pip" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:soap12="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap12/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:wsaw="http://www.w3.org/2006/05/addressing/wsdl" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2004/09/policy" xmlns:wsu="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-wssecurity-utility-1.0.xsd" xmlns:wsoma="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2004/09/policy/optimizedmimeserialization" xmlns:pip="urn:hieos:policy:pip"> <wsdl:types> <xsd:schema targetNamespace="urn:hieos:policy:pip"> <xsd:include schemaLocation="PIP.xsd"/> </xsd:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="GetConsentDirectivesRequestMessage"> <wsdl:part name="body" element="pip:GetConsentDirectivesRequest"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="GetConsentDirectivesResponseMessage"> <wsdl:part name="body" element="pip:GetConsentDirectivesResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="PIPPortType"> <wsdl:operation name="GetConsentDirectives"> <wsdl:input message="pip:GetConsentDirectivesRequestMessage" wsaw:Action="urn:hieos:policy:pip:GetConsentDirectivesRequest"/> <wsdl:output message="pip:GetConsentDirectivesResponseMessage" wsaw:Action="urn:hieos:policy:pip:GetConsentDirectivesResponse"/> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="PIPBindingSoap12" type="pip:PIPPortType"> <soap12:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsaw:UsingAddressing wsdl:required="true"/> <wsdl:operation name="GetConsentDirectives"> <soap12:operation soapAction="urn:hieos:policy:pip:GetConsentDirectivesRequest"/> <wsdl:input> <soap12:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap12:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="pip"> <wsdl:port name="PIPEndpoint" binding="pip:PIPBindingSoap12"> <soap12:address location="http://localhost:8080/axis2/services/pip"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">This is the WSDL for the HIEOS Policy Information Point (PIP) Service.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </wsdl:definitions>

<!--edited with XMLSpy v2011 rel. 3 (x64) (http://www.altova.com) by Bernie Thuman (Vangent, Inc.)--> <xsd:schema targetNamespace="urn:hieos:policy:pip" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:pip="urn:hieos:policy:pip"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">This is the schema definition for the HIEOS Policy Information Point (PIP) Service.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:element name="GetConsentDirectivesRequest"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">TBA</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="PatientId" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <!--<hieos-consent:ConsentDirectives xmlns:hieos-consent="urn:hieos:policy:1.0:consent"> <hieos-consent:AllowedOrganizations> <hieos-consent:Organization>1.1</hieos-consent:Organization> <hieos-consent:Organization>1.2</hieos-consent:Organization> </hieos-consent:AllowedOrganizations> <hieos-consent:SensitiveDocumentTypes> <hieos-consent:DocumentType code="1" codeSystem="1"/> <hieos-consent:DocumentType code="2" codeSystem="1"/> </hieos-consent:SensitiveDocumentTypes> </hieos-consent:ConsentDirectives>--> <xsd:element name="GetConsentDirectivesResponse"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">TBD</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="ConsentDirectives" type="pip:ConsentDirectivesType" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="ConsentDirectivesType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="AllowedOrganizations" type="pip:OrganizationsType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="BlockedOrganizations" type="pip:OrganizationsType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="BlockedIndividuals" type="pip:IndividualsType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="AllowedRoles" type="pip:RolesType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="AllowedPurposeOfUse" type="pip:PurposeOfUseTypes" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="SensitiveDocumentTypes" type="pip:SensitiveDocumentTypes" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="SensitiveDocumentAccessList" type="pip:SensitiveDocumentAccessTypes" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:attribute name="alwaysAuthorize" type="xsd:boolean" default="false"/> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="SensitiveDocumentAccessType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Organization" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="Individual" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="SensitiveDocumentAccessTypes"> <xsd:sequence maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xsd:element name="SensitiveDocumentAccess" type="pip:SensitiveDocumentAccessType" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="OrganizationsType"> <xsd:sequence maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xsd:element name="Organization" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="IndividualsType"> <xsd:sequence maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xsd:element name="Individual" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="RolesType"> <xsd:sequence maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xsd:element name="Role" type="pip:CodeType" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="PurposeOfUseTypes"> <xsd:sequence maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xsd:element name="PurposeOfUse" type="pip:CodeType" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="SensitiveDocumentTypes"> <xsd:sequence maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xsd:element name="DocumentType" type="pip:CodeType" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="CodeType"> <xsd:attribute name="code" type="xsd:string" use="required"/> <xsd:attribute name="codeSystem" type="xsd:string" use="required"/> <xsd:attribute name="codeSystemName" type="xsd:string" use="optional"/> <xsd:attribute name="displayName" type="xsd:string" use="optional"/> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>
